name: Chaos Combat Chess
description:
Draft uniquely powerful units from across space and time, develop a winning strategy, clash with online opponents and climb the ranks in Chaos Combat Chess!

Draft Powerful Units

Choose from a unique lineup of crazy characters with powerful abilities and build the ultimate team!

Develop Your Strategy

Place your units on the chess board in whatever formation you choose and unleash chaos upon your opponent in this 8 player last-man-standing strategy chess game.

Stack Up Synergies

Place similar type pieces next to each other for increased abilities and buffs. Collect duplicates and unlock powerful Rank Bonuses that alter the play styles of your units.

Clash With Opponents

Battle other players online in multi-round matches. Ensure victory by utilizing your strengths and taking advantage of your opponent’s weaknesses.

Customize Your Experience

Unlock new unit skins, collect chess boards and find unique items for your robot companion to make yourself stand out from other players!

Unlock Rewards

Increase your Chess Pass Level, complete Weekly Quests and complete Seasonal Challenges to receive valuable rewards!

Climb the Ranks

Collect trophies to climb the global leaderboards and become the top player in the world!
